src:
VIDEO: Tornado povzročil kaos in razdejanje, dedek in babica umrla
Tovornjak je trčil v mercedesa.
05 Nov 2019, 07:35 by T. V.
INĐIJA – Vojvodinsko Inđijo z okoli 26.000 prebivalci je zajelo hudo neurje, med katerim sta na avtocesti Beograd–Novi Sad trčila tovornjak in osebni avtomobil mercedes. Srbski mediji poročajo, da sta v mercedesu umrla Radovan (60) in Dragica Filipović (56), poškodovani pa sta njuni vnukinji, 10-letni dvojčici, in vnuk (2). Nesreča se je zgodila na mestu, kjer potekajo vzdrževalna dela. Mercedes se je sicer vključeval v promet z odstavnega pasu.Orkanski veter, ki je spominjal na tornado, je povzročil pravi kaos in nosil vse pred seboj. Na spletu se je znašel posenetek iz avtomobila, na katerem je voznik zapeljal v velik oblak prahu, ki ga je povzročil veter.
text:
VIDEO: Tornado caused chaos and devastation, grandfather and grandmother die
The truck crashed into a Mercedes.
05 Nov 2019, 07:35 by T.V.
INDJIJA - Vojvodina's Indjija with a population of about 26,000 has been hit by a severe storm, during which a truck and a Mercedes car collided on the Belgrade-Novi Sad highway. Serbian media reported that Radovan (60) and Dragica Filipovic (56) died in a Mercedes, with their two grandchildren, 10-year-old twins and 2 grandchildren injured. The accident happened at the place where the maintenance work takes place. Mercedes was getting involved in traffic from the right lane. The tornado-like wind caused a real chaos and carried everything in front of it. An online clip of a car found the driver driving into a large cloud of dust caused by the wind.
